#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,n,h,a[10005];

	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
			bool fl=true;
		cin>>h>>n;
		
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];}
			sort(a,a+n);
			//if(i==0)
			//max=a[i];
			for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
			{
			
				if(a[i]+h<a[i+1])
				{
					fl=false;
					break;
				}
				
			}
		
		if(fl)
		cout<<"Yes\n";
		else
		cout<<"No\n";
	}
}
